name: Q1_2_Are_you_willing_to_respond_to_this_household_visit
label: 1.2 'Hello. My name is ____, and I am working with [NGO NAME]. We are doing an assessment to understand your needs with regard to water, sanitation and hygiene. The interview takes about 30 minutes to complete. The information you provide will be summarised with all other respondents, and it will help to produce reports that will be used for humanitarian planning. Any information you provide that may be used to identify your household will be kept confidential. Are you willing to respond to this household visit?
